ops.description: addPaletteColors_0xe9({sourcePaletteId:0, targetPaletteId:16, r:0, g:Bank[5][0], b:Bank[5][0], size:255});
addPaletteColors_0xe9({sourcePaletteId:0, targetPaletteId:16, r:0, g:Bank[5][0], b:Bank[5][0], size:255});
Bank[6][2] = getLastFieldMapId(); // wm does not count

showWindowWithDialog({window:0, dialog:2}); // {Red XIII}
“ A certain battle?”
{ let pos = getEntityPosition({entityId:6}); Bank[6][4] = pos.x; Bank[6][6] = pos.y; Bank[6][8] = pos.z; Bank[6][10] = pos.triangleId; }

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:1}); // Bugenhagen
“Ho Ho Hoooo.”{PAUSE}“Everyone here's a Ghost
of the Gi tribe,
killed in a certain battle.”

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:3}); // Bugenhagen
“The vengeful spirits of the Gi
didn't disappear, and couldn't
return to the Lifestream…”{PAUSE}“We still have far to go.
Ho Ho Hoooo.”

showWindowWithDialog({window:0, dialog:12}); // You cannot take on any more Materia.
Please discard some Materia.

dialogStrings:
Bugenhagen
“Ho Ho Hoooo.”{PAUSE}“Everyone here's a Ghost
of the Gi tribe,
killed in a certain battle.”

Bugenhagen
“The vengeful spirits of the Gi
didn't disappear, and couldn't
return to the Lifestream…”{PAUSE}“We still have far to go.
Ho Ho Hoooo.”

Bugenhagen
“This cave leads to
the back of Cosmo Canyon.”

Bugenhagen
“If we had been attacked by the Gi here,
we wouldn't have stood a chance.”

{Cloud}
“This is a strange looking rock…”
{CHOICE}Break it open
{CHOICE}Leave it alone

{Cloud}
“Funny looking rock…”
{CHOICE}Break it open
{CHOICE}Leave it as is

{Cloud}
“An odd shaped rock…”
{CHOICE}Break it open
{CHOICE}Leave it as is
